website_summaries.verdict: If you're heading out to spread the cheer this festive season, the large handles on these reusable gift bags will make your job that much easier. Ideal for on-the-go gifting.
pros: Large and sturdy enough to hold heavier gifts or multiple smaller items weighing up to 30 lbs
Grocery bag design is easy to carry
Each bag features its own festive phrase and cute prints
Wipes clean with a wet cloth
Comes with 6 bags and 2 sizes per set
cons: Sides might not stand up by themselves unless the bags are reasonably full

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who received a gift from me in one of these bags loved it. They're really nice, cute, and durable. They don't stand up very well on their own, but once I laid the gift down flat on the bottom of the bag and put tissue paper inside it's fine. I did find that I had to use more tissue paper with these bags than with regular paper bags. I think it's because the fabric bags are more flappy (if that makes sense) and it took a bit more paper to fill the opening hide the gift. Not a big deal, but just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: REally nice gift bags
customer_reviews.text: THese bags are pretty and made exactly like the grocery bags you get at the store for a couple of bucks, except you get two different sizes. They are perfect for larger and heavier gifts that would probably tear a paper bag. Also, perfect for items that don't wrap well or need a big ugly box. I'm going to check and see if they make a more generic (non-Christmas) version.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Temple

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: These bags were great for the money, I bought these to put my Christmas gifts in, was a little disappointed they did not have card board in the bottom, did not use them for some of my gifts, because they bulged out the bottom, may be good for grocerys, but for gifts, did not like them, but they are beautiful and maybe for some light thing like a scarf or socks they would be great.
customer_reviews.author: debra conners

customer_reviews.title: Another great Earthwise bag(s)!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Earthwise bags a couple of years ago, and check every now and then to see if they have a new design out -and these are nice Christmas designs. Family love to receive their gifts in them as they are very durable when reused over and over afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeelv

customer_reviews.title: Nice thought for the occasion but ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice thought for the occasion but two of the bags were not sown properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sargeant Becker

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much I ordered more!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely thrilled with these bags. Originally, I was only thinking of using them for my extra special Christmas gifts. As soon as I had them in my hands I decided every present, no matter how valuable, deserved one. Naturally, I immediately ordered two more packs!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, great price! Bought these sturdy bags to cart Christmas gifts to the relatives and they more than did the trick. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and perfect to pack up the open gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. Used For each family member to take their Christmas gifts home conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsee

customer_reviews.title: They are reusable! Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for Christmas gifts this year. What a great idea! Just wish there was a package deal with an even bigger amount of bags and in more sizes.
customer_reviews.author: lori kosmyna

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: People loved these bags. Bought them to use as gift bags for Xmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Many Great uses
customer_reviews.text: My family really enjoyed receiving their gifts in a bag they could reuse instead of paper to dispose of. Great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great for holiday gifts
customer_reviews.text: These bags are well-made and can be reused for gift giving for years. Very reasonable price considering what paper gift bags are selling for now.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hoehn

customer_reviews.title: Great way to give gifts
customer_reviews.text: Great way to wrap multiple items at one time and then can use again next year
customer_reviews.author: kara baldridge

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: 2 bags fell apart before using. Sizes are awkward, either too small or too big.
customer_reviews.author: Britt B

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using reusable bags for gifts for quite a few years. The family likes getting them and covers the years by the bags they received. Makes taking their gifts home much easier and there's no mess or paper for us to clean up! Will continue to do this for ever!
customer_reviews.author: Mom W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for the holiday!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered theses bags for Christmas to give out clothes and boots in them. The bags were a nice size. I had a mixture of sizes. The smaller ones I was able to fit clothes and tissue paper in them. I put ribbon around the straps (handles of the bags). The design and color is nice. They are durable too. Overall a nice product and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Harris Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Super Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great bags for what I needed to "wrap". The quality was very good and supportive with strong handles. They are great for Christmas as they are decorated for Christmas! Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: best idea i ever had
customer_reviews.text: im tired of spending money on bags just to be thrown out. this year I seen these and thought this is perfect! everyone liked them and will use them year round!
customer_reviews.author: BUTTERFLYRAGE

customer_reviews.title: Durable funny all around great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put Christmas gifts in, so everyone can haul their gifts home. They are welll made durable and has a nice loop to tie a name tag to.
customer_reviews.author: katsat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use as gift bags for Christmas gifts and they worked perfectly. It also adds a extra gift and less waste as they are reusable.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer richards

product_meta.title: Earthwise Reusable Grocery Gift Bags Holiday Xmas Designs - Large & Medium Size - 6 Assorted Designs (Pack of 6)
feature_bullets: 6 ASSORTED HOLIDAY DESIGNS: This set of reusable bags comes with 6 different holiday designs and 2 different sizes.
DURABLE: These bags are made from 80gsm non-woven material and are tested to hold 30lbs.

MULTI USE: These bags are great for gift giving, grocery shopping and much more! GREAT ALThese bags make a great gift wrapping alternative to gift wrap and make gifting easy, no need to wrap your gift, just put the gift in these roomy bags, add some tissue paper and you're ready to gift.
EASY TO CLEAN: Made from coated woven material which wipes down with a wet cloth and cleans easily and can be used over and over..
LARGE & MEDIUM SIZES: The Set of 6 Bags includes (3) Large bags 17" H x 14" W x 7"G and (3) Medium Bags 12.5" H x 10" W x 4.5" G perfect for a variety of gift sizes all in one convenient pack!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
